name: Bulletweaver (bullet hell prototype)
description:
WASD (or arrow keys) to move

R to Restart 

--

Made this proof of concept for Weekly Game Jam #161 (Theme: Pilot). I decided I wanted to make a bullet hell / shmup game, but thought it'd be cool if the bullets themselves periodically transformed their coordinate spaces.

Heavy inspiration from the 3Blue1Brown "Essence of  Linear Algebra" youtube series. And got super carried by the "Shapes" asset for Unity.

Hoping that there is some potential here for interesting/fun gameplay as well as a way to give people an intuition on how linear transformations work. Right now there's none of that though lol
